snippet: James Davis, former chief financial officer of the Stanford Financial Group, testified against R. Allen Stanford, the Texas financier accused of defrauding investors in a $7 billion Ponzi scheme, reported Cllifford Krauss for The New York Times.

headline.main: In Fraud Case, Ex-Partner Says Stanford Was 'Dictatorial'
